name: Black Diamond Free Fall
description:
This is the my first published game. I made it about in 4 days from scratch. In this game you control a diamond that has to reach to the blue cube while avoiding red triangles. More Levels are coming.

Movement Controls are usual
  • A/LeftArrow - Move Left
  • D/RightArrow - Move Right
  • Space - Jump

Hope you enjoy this.....
